body:
Don't get me wrong, I think the plot is shit, like driving the girl to suicidal thoughts and making her life miserable just because she hurt mc's feelings by LITERARY BEING ORDINARY NORMAL GIRL HAVING BOYFRIEND can't be considered right,
also this guy is a joke by thinking he has any right to destroy someone's apearrance/life because "boo hoo a girl who doesn't even know disgusting bastard like me is having a boyfriend, she's cheeting what a whore" and is amazingly unreliable,
BUT I still consider this hentai great as I have a thing about pure innocent girls being oppressed and tormented(?) without actual physical harm, for instance this heavly body modification and stuff when girls thinks they are in hopeless situation... Well I have really good imagination so it's not hard for me to create in my mind something like "Ba-bam! Poof! Shitty main character is dead and yuka is saved my *my-own-insert-mc* and her body will be recovered with time, yada yada", so yeah in short: Good hentai.
It's always incels that get these wish fulfillment apps, lol. And man, this one's such a piece of shit that he made her want to commit suicide after ruining her life.
I feel like I would've liked this more if there wasn't a 'my life is ruined and I want to commit suicide' comment. Like damn, there's kinky and there's just plain depressing.
U should do another one of this instead of a big clit put a cock
